entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
